meanings.definition: The quality of being excessively particular or fussy about small details.
meanings.sent1: Her persnicketinesses about the color of the curtains delayed the home decoration process.
meanings.sent2: His persnicketinesses regarding grammar made him a meticulous editor.
meanings.sent3: The persnicketinesses of the cat about the placement of its toys amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The persnicketinesses of the clock about being perfectly on time was like a strict teacher.
meanings.sent5: The persnicketinesses of the chef about the presentation of the dish was legendary in the culinary world.

meanings.definition: An instance of being overly concerned with trivial matters.
meanings.sent1: The team's persnicketinesses about the font style on the presentation slides caused delays.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his persnicketinesses about the arrangement of the books on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The persnicketinesses of the squirrel about the position of its nuts was comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: The persnicketinesses of the old car about starting only on certain days was like a quirky friend.
meanings.sent5: The persnicketinesses of the student about the neatness of their notes was unmatched in the class.
